channel.title: CQS on Cezary Piątek Blog
channel.description: Recent content in CQS on Cezary Piątek Blog

item.title: CQRS snippets
item.description: A year ago, during my trip to one of Software developer conferences, I got a lot of opportunities to discuss variety of topics related to software architecture. Most of them concerned CQRS and CQS patterns. I heard about them many times before but I’ve never had a chance to use them in practice. After getting back from the conference, I decided to give it a shot and try to introduce it in one of my private projects.
